summary: WAS DRIVING CAR AROUND 55 MPH WHEN THE CAR JUST TURNED OFF AND LOST ALL POWER STEERING AND BRAKES, ENGINE JUST CUT OFF WITHOUT WARNING. I WAS ABLE TO PULL THE CAR OVER TO THE SIDE OF THE ROAD AND RESTART THE CAR. THE CAR WAS TAKEN TO A SERVICE STATION AND NO CODES WERE FOUND TO WHY THE CAR JUST STOP WORKING.
